nodes.text: Giuseppe Camuncoli (born March 2, 1975) is an Italian comic book artist who has contributed the artwork for every issue of Marvel Comics' Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith series written by Charles Soule. He has also provided two covers for the series, as well as a variant cover for issue 4 of the Star Wars series.

Camuncoli has also been a frequent artist on various Spider-Man series', with recent works including Superior Spider-Man and the 2015 relaunch of the Amazing Spider-Man series. He previously worked on the Green Valley original series with screenwriter Max Landis.
